titleStmt.title: His Majesties most gracious speech to both Houses of Parliament, on Munday the 27th of January, 1689
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.
Mary II, Queen of England, 1662-1694.
England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: By the heir of Andrew Anderson,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
William III thanks the House of Peers for funds to wage war.
